name: Kaushal H. Nagar
about: Skilled React Native Developer with 1+ year of experience building production-grade mobile applications. Proven ability to develop robust, scalable apps with clean architecture and performance optimization. Strong in JavaScript/TypeScript with expertise in RESTful API integration, state management (Context API), push notifications, and native module bridging. Experienced in implementing mobile-first UIs, real-time features with Socket.IO, and app store deployments. Passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with mobile development trends. Quick learner with experience in fast-paced environments and strong collaborative skills.

skills.API Integration: RESTful APIs (Axios), Socket.IO for real-time features

highlights: Implementing clean architecture and performance optimizations
Implementing push notifications for user engagement
Collaborating with cross-functional teams in fast-paced environment

details.title: Full Development Lifecycle:
details.description: Built production-ready chat app from scratch using React Native (Functional Components with Hooks) and TypeScript, implementing Firebase push notifications for message alerts.

details.title: Notification System:
details.description: Configured and implemented push notifications using Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) for both iOS and Android platforms, improving user engagement by 25%.

details.title: State Management:
details.description: Implemented efficient global state management using Context API across multiple chat screens.

details.title: Real-time Features:
details.description: Developed Socket.IO integration with presence detection, typing indicators, and optimized reconnection logic.

details.title: App Store Deployment:
details.description: Managed complete deployment process to both Apple App Store and Google Play Store, including push notification capability configuration.

details.title: Codebase Modernization:
details.description: Transformed legacy React Native code to modern architecture, reducing bugs by 40%.

details.title: Notification Integration:
details.description: Integrated push notifications for service updates and appointment reminders using Firebase.

details.title: UI/UX Improvements:
details.description: Redesigned user flows with React Navigation and implemented smooth animations using Reanimated.

responsibilities.title: Push Notification Implementation:
responsibilities.description: Configured push notification capabilities for native iOS applications, gaining knowledge applicable to React Native implementations.

projects.name: React Native E-commerce Prototype
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform e-commerce app prototype with product listings, cart functionality.

availability.contractPreference: Open to 6-month contract (extendable based on performance)
